Open Registry.  

This will open Registry Editor, navigate to the key:  
Computer\HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control  

Right-click on the Control key in the left panel, select New > Key.  

Name it as StorageDevicePolicies.  

Right-click on StorageDevicePolicies, add New > Key > DWORD.  

Name it as WriteBlocker and modify the value from 0 to 1.  

Now an error message will show when you try to copy or move a document to USB.  

To revert the changes, modify the value from 1 to 0.
